name: Bingo Country Vibes
description:
Play your way through the game and unlock exciting new episodes with cool country sound. Earn Experience Points (XP) to move up in the tournaments and Win Huge Rewards!
Earn special awards as you complete a new episode.

FEATURES

Tournament-style play
A lot of amazing episodes to collect
Compete with thousands of people around the globe in real-time multiplayer
Live chat with players
An amazing community
Free app updates
Thanks for playing Bingo Country Vibes!
We would love to hear your feedback!

PLEASE NOTE! Bingo Kingdom Arena is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money.
This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."

Support
